artists.name: BUJA
artists.fullBio: BUJA transforms cityscapes into vibrant dialogues between artist and community. With over a decade in street art, their work challenges perceptions of public space and creative expression.
artists.description: Urban aesthetics meet contemporary expression. BUJA transforms cityscapes into vibrant dialogue.

artists.name: Nina Bussjäger
artists.fullBio: Nina Bussjäger brings classical painting techniques into the contemporary realm. Her works explore the intersection of tradition and modernity, creating pieces that speak to both heritage and innovation.
artists.description: Timeless elegance in every brushstroke. Traditional mastery with a contemporary vision.

artists.name: Timothy Starratt
artists.shortBio: Pure form and color dancing in space.
artists.fullBio: Timothy's abstract works strip down to the essence of visual language. Color, form, and composition become vehicles for emotional expression, creating immersive visual experiences.
artists.description: Pure form and color dancing in space. Abstraction as a language beyond representation.

artists.name: Gizmoh
artists.fullBio: Gizmoh creates visual stories that blur the lines between illustration and fine art. Each piece is a poetic narrative rendered in exquisite detail and imagination.
artists.description: Where illustration meets narrative. Visual stories that whisper and sing.

artists.name: Elena Rossi
artists.fullBio: Elena captures the complexity of human emotion and connection through figurative painting. Her portraits and figure studies reveal the inner landscape of the human experience.

artists.name: Marcus Chen
artists.fullBio: Marcus Chen explores the intersection of traditional artistic principles and cutting-edge digital technology, creating works that challenge our perception of medium and authenticity.

artists.name: Sofía García
artists.fullBio: Sofía's conceptual practice examines social structures and cultural narratives. Her installations and interventions provoke thought and dialogue.

artists.name: James Wilson
artists.fullBio: James combines traditional and unconventional materials to create richly textured works that invite tactile and visual exploration.

artists.name: Yuki Tanaka
artists.fullBio: Yuki's photographic eye captures the essence of moments, transforming everyday scenes into profound meditations on time, memory, and human connection.

artists.name: Klaus Mueller
artists.fullBio: Klaus creates monumental sculptures that engage with space and materiality. His work questions the relationship between object, viewer, and environment.

artists.name: Priya Sharma
artists.fullBio: Priya's video installations explore temporal experience and embodied perception. Her works create immersive environments that engage all senses.

artists.name: Ahmed Hassan
artists.fullBio: Ahmed's practice bridges traditional calligraphy with contemporary art, exploring language as both semantic and aesthetic force.

artists.name: Lucia Fontana
artists.shortBio: Body as canvas, action as art.
artists.fullBio: Lucia's performance practice challenges conventional notions of artistic medium, making the body and its movements central to the work.
artists.description: Body as canvas, action as art.

artists.name: David Kim
artists.fullBio: David revitalizes traditional printmaking methods, creating works that honor craft while engaging with current artistic discourse.

artists.name: Isabelle Dubois
artists.fullBio: Isabelle transforms entire spaces into immersive artworks, inviting viewers to become participants in the aesthetic experience.

artists.name: Oscar Santos
artists.fullBio: Oscar's ceramic practice celebrates the materiality and imperfection of clay, creating forms that bridge utilitarian and fine art traditions.

artists.name: Mei Wong
artists.fullBio: Mei's textile works weave together cultural narratives and personal histories, creating tactile explorations of identity and belonging.

artists.name: Carlos Moreno
artists.fullBio: Carlos brings vibrant energy to public spaces, transforming walls into dynamic canvases that challenge and inspire communities.
